languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Whenever wielder kills a {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}, they gain additional Prey Difficulty Type% additional outgoing damage until end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

languages.text: 每当装备者击杀被标记{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的目标时，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高，等同于<u>（猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者击杀被标记{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的目标时，造成的所有伤害都会提高，等同于<u>（猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}可叠加。

languages.text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}として指定されたターゲットを殺すたびに、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に＋<u>（獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}）</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}はスタックできる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}として指定されたターゲットを殺すたびに、戦闘終了時までダメージに<u>（獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}）</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g} はスタックできる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} del +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa)</u> % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta que termine el combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} del +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa)</u> % al daño hasta que termine el combate. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wann immer der Träger ein Ziel als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiert, erlangt er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen +<u>(Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g})</u> %-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Effekt addiert sich.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger ein Ziel als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiert, erlangt er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen +<u>(Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g})</u> %-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf Schaden. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} addiert sich.

languages.text: Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи)</u>% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к наносимому урону до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к наносимому урону до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible désignée comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté de la proie{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} est cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible désignée comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté de la proie{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} est cumulable.
